topics.body:
You know what I legitimately hate?  Whenever a youtuber has them begging for you to watch them right off the bat and it's as loud as fucking possible to the point you yank your headphones out of the socket in shock; you don't need to make shit *THAT* fucking loud.

"*HEY EVERYONE!  I'M <INSERT HERE>!  MAKE SURE TO LEAVE A LIKE AND FAVORITE AND ENJOY THE VIDEO!*"

refer to the fact that I've made over 10,000 posts "on the Minecraft Forums":http://www.minecraftforum.net/members/SuperSupermario24
(i know my postcount on there is only 1,247 but posts in the "Forum Games":http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/off-topic/forum-games don't count)
(although there used to be a series of chat threads in the "General Discussion":http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/off-topic/general-off-topic section, so those posts actually _did_ count toward people's postcounts)
(but i never posted in those, and they're all gone (at least locked) now)
